section1.title: What is BrainBrain IQ Test?
section1.subtitle:
BrainBrain provides real-time result analysis and feedback through customized tests of varying difficulty levels.
This helps you identify your strengths and areas for improvement, and suggests methods to train your brain.
Additionally, personal information is strictly protected, and all data is securely managed.

description1.title: Reliable and Accurate Results
description1.content: BrainBrain provides accurate and reliable results based on the latest psychological research and verified IQ tests. We ensure that all users receive credible IQ scores by adhering to scientific standards.

description2.title: Personalized Analysis
description2.content: Beyond just scores, we provide detailed analysis of test results. You can better understand your brain capabilities by identifying strengths and areas for improvement in each field.

description3.title: Convenient Online Access
description3.content: BrainBrain is easily accessible anywhere, anytime with internet connection. You can take the test at your convenience without being restricted by time and place.

section2.title: IQ Score Distribution
section2.subtitle: Intelligence Quotient (IQ) is a numerical value that quantifies cognitive ability, measuring psychological indicators such as logical thinking, problem-solving, memory, and reasoning abilities. IQ is influenced by both genetic and environmental factors and should be interpreted as one indicator of comprehensive cognitive ability rather than a simple number.

test.question: Question
test.confirmSubmit: Do you want to submit the test?
test.confirmSubmitDescription: You cannot modify your answers after submission.

warning.title: Test Instructions
warning.description: Please check the following before starting the test.

rules.timeLimit: The test consists of 42 questions with a 40-minute time limit.
rules.allQuestions: You must answer all questions to see your results.
rules.noPageLeave: Leaving the page will stop the test and your progress will not be saved.
rules.noRefresh: Do not close the browser or refresh during the test.

invalid.contactMessage: If you still experience issues despite taking the test properly,

result.title: IQ Test Results
result.description: This score is in the top {percent}%.

fail.description: An error occurred during payments processing. Please try again later.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: Brain Lab (hereinafter referred to as the "Company") values the personal information of users in operating the BrainBrain service (hereinafter referred to as the "Service") and establishes and discloses the following privacy policy to safely protect and lawfully process personal information in accordance with relevant laws and regulations.

article1.title: Article 1 (Personal Information Items and Collection Methods)
article1.description: The Company collects the following personal information.

items.title: Collection Items
items.personalInfo: Name, email address, gender, age, country

methods.title: Collection Methods
methods.directInput: Information directly entered by users during test or payments process
methods.paymentsInfo: Payments information received from PG company

article2.title: Article 2 (Purpose of Collection and Use of Personal Information)
article2.description: The Company uses the collected personal information for the following purposes.

purposes.certificate: Creating certificates and reports based on IQ test results
purposes.support: Responding to user inquiries and service-related notices

article3.title: Article 3 (Retention and Use Period of Personal Information)
article3.description: The Company destroys personal information without delay after the purpose of collection and use is achieved. However, the following information is retained for the specified period.

retention.items: Retention Items: Name, email, gender, age group, country, score, payments history
retention.period: Retention Period: 2 years from collection date or until user requests deletion

article4.title: Article 4 (Provision of Personal Information to Third Parties)
article4.description: The Company does not provide users' personal information to third parties. However, exceptions may be made in accordance with relevant laws and regulations.

article5.title: Article 5 (Outsourcing of Personal Information Processing)
article5.description: The Company outsources some tasks as follows and manages and supervises the outsourced companies to comply with the Personal Information Protection Act.

table.emailTask: Email transmission (excluding user information, only attaching certificate and report files)

article6.title: Article 6 (User Rights and Exercise Methods)
article6.description: Users may exercise the following rights with the Company at any time.

rights.access: Request for access to personal information

article6.contact: â» These rights can be exercised via email (ð© brainbrainsite@gmail.com), and the Company will take action without delay.

article7.title: Article 7 (Installation and Operation of Automatic Collection Devices)
article7.description: The Company does not use cookies or web log analysis tools (such as Google Analytics).

article8.title: Article 8 (Security Measures for Personal Information)
article8.description: The Company takes the following security measures in accordance with Article 29 of the Personal Information Protection Act.

measures.encryption: Encryption of document files and transmission files
measures.security: External access control and security software usage

article9.title: Article 9 (Personal Information Protection Officer)
article9.description: The Company designates a personal information protection officer who is responsible for overseeing personal information processing and handling inquiries and complaints related to personal information.

article10.title: Article 10 (Changes to Privacy Policy)
article10.description: This privacy policy may be changed in accordance with laws and internal operating policies, and changes will be notified in advance through service notices or email.

service.title: Terms of Service
service.introduction: These terms and conditions are established to regulate the rights, obligations, and responsibilities between Brain Lab (hereinafter referred to as the "Company") and users regarding the use of the BrainBrain website (hereinafter referred to as the "Service").

article1.title: Article 1 (Purpose)
article1.description: These terms and conditions are established to regulate the conditions and procedures for using the IQ test and related result report/certificate issuance service provided by the Company.

definitions.user: "User" refers to a person who accesses the service and uses it in accordance with these terms.
definitions.payments: "Payments" refers to the act of a user paying a certain amount to the Company to use paid services.
definitions.content: "Content" refers to the results provided by the Company within the service, including text, images, reports, certificates, etc.

effectiveness.notice: These terms become effective when posted on the service screen or announced by other means.
effectiveness.changes: The Company may change the terms within the scope not violating relevant laws, and changed terms will be announced with the effective date.
effectiveness.disagreement: If a user does not agree to the changed terms, they may discontinue using the service.

services.title: The Company provides the following services:
services.report: Personalized report and certificate creation and email delivery

payments.paidContent: This service is provided for a fee for some content, and users can use paid content through payments.
payments.process: Payments is processed through Toss Paymentss (PG), and users must fully confirm the amount and conditions presented at the time of payments.
payments.refund: Refunds are generally not possible after payments completion. However, the Company may individually determine refunds in case of service failure or major errors.
